name: Night Watch (itch) (RainbowCemetery, bagelcollie)
description:
Broken windows, banging trash cans, and booing noises !

Ghosts, creatures, and other creepy critters have risen up from the cracks in the ground and are going around menacing the neighbourhood this spooky night. But a plucky little possum has taken it upon herself to keep these ghosts in order, with a bat !

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys to navigate the menu and Z to select
  • ← bat left
  • → bat right
  • ↑ jump
  • ↓ fall down

CREDITS

Coding - RainbowCemetery
Pixels - BagelCollie
Music - both
Voice - Kaden

KNOWN ERRORS

The header provided by itch.io to enable SharedArrayBuffer isn't currently compatible with firefox by default. If you are a firefox user you may either click the link to go to another version outside of itch.io rainbowcemetery.com/NightWatch_WEBGL or navigate to about:config and set browser.tabs.remote.coep.credentialless to true.
